A Minecraft Bedrock Edition addon that allows you to create, manage, and teleport to warp points in your world. This pack enables players to set up custom teleportation locations with names, icons, and coordinates across different dimensions.

## Files

- BP files: {{ bp_files }}
- RP files: {{ rp_files }}
- Total blocks: {{ total_blocks }}
- Total items: {{ total_items }}
- Total models: {{ total_models }}
- Configured locales: {{ locales_list }}

## Installation

1. Download the `.mcaddon` file from the assets below
2. Open Minecraft Bedrock Edition
3. Go to Settings > Global Resources > My Packs
4. Click "Import" and select the downloaded file
5. Activate the pack in your world

## Features

- Create and manage warp points with custom names and icons
- Teleport to warps via interactive menu or commands
- Support for multiple dimensions (Overworld, Nether, The End)
- Distance calculation and sorting of warps by proximity
- Multiple icon options (location pin, heart, house, building, bank, shop, trees)
- Warp Menu item for easy access to all warps
- Optional craftable Warp Menu item (via subpack)
